title: Lawn and Order
description: Jumi brings the case against her husband, Josh. Josh thinks they need a riding mower to tame their front and backyards. Jumi says the idea is absurd and impractical. Who's right? Who's wrong? Only one man can decide.
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
